synopsis.text: Hama-chan, or Hamasaki Densuke, is an ordinary salaryman with an extraordinary passion for fishing. Despite his lackluster career and constant disagreements with his wife, he finds solace and joy in his beloved hobby. His transformation while fishing is remarkable; from a reserved and unambitious individual, he becomes a confident and charismatic person. Even his superiors, including the president of his company, are drawn to his magnetic personality and become his fishing students. Hama-chan's love for fishing transcends all boundaries, and he prioritizes it above all else, even if it means inviting the disapproval of those around him. This heartwarming anime follows Hama-chan's journey as he pursues his passion and unwittingly touches the lives of those around him.
